title: Getting a lot of champ shards
body:
This season I've opened 4 hextech chests. Not only were they harder to get than last season, all of them contained disappointing champ shards, half of which were for champs I already owned - and I don't own much.
/mindlessqq

replies.body:
Yes but now give us a convincing argument about why those champ shards are not useful. Those champ shards equate to 1700IP which is like 20 games of experience. You can reroll 3 to a champ you dont own, or you can use them to master the ones you do own...

Getting a legendary skin that costs 1500 gold crystal stuff on a champ you dont even play (aether skin for kayle)... NOW THAT FEELS LIKE USELESS.

Now we've both had a cry.
